oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Invitation and Ticket to Mardi Gras Ball 1877
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Mardi Gras; Mystic Memphi;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Invitation and Ticket to Memphi Mardi Gras Ball at the Memphis Theatre on Feb. 13, 1877. Partial Invitation to 1880 event.
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: Manuscript collection processed by John Jones
